name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TV2 Play & NRK TV Subtitle Translator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Norwegian subtitles to English on TV2 Play and NRK TV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy your favorite Norwegian programs with ease, even if you don’t speak the language! The TV2 Play & NRK TV Subtitle Translator seamlessly translates Norwegian subtitles into English in real-time. Whether you’re catching up on the latest TV show or watching an in-depth documentary, this extension helps you stay fully engaged without language barriers.

Features:

Real-Time Translation: Subtitles are detected and translated on the fly, ensuring minimal delay.
Works on TV2 Play & NRK TV: No need for multiple tools—this single extension supports both platforms.
Preserves Formatting: Maintains multi-line subtitle formatting for better readability.
Context-Aware: Treats multi-line subtitles as a single segment for more accurate, cohesive translations.
Easy to Use: Just install and play your video—no extra steps required.
Enhance your viewing experience today and dive into Norwegian content without missing a thing!
